channel.title: Contains("Mod"), Contains("Admin")

item.title: Contains("Mod"), Contains("Admin")
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Ops, lol, wasn’t looking… you didn’t tell me it was anti leech! lol jk, Umm, I improved it a bit…

Here:

try { if (playerName.contains("admin") && playerRights < 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " just got banned for trying to pretend he was admin!"; appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; outStream.createFrame(109); } } catch(Exception E) { } try { if (playerName.contains("mod") && playerRights < 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " just got banned for trying to pretend he was mod!"; appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; outStream.createFrame(109); } } catch(Exception E) { } try { if (playerName.contains("owner") && playerRights < 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " just got banned for trying to pretend he was Owner!!"; appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; outStream.createFrame(109); } } catch(Exception E) { }

Read full topic

item.title: Contains("Mod"), Contains("Admin")
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“i_own_pking, post:5, topic:161662”][quote author=X F U R Y X link=topic=219995.msg1906935#msg1906935 date=1196477265]
I get this… Don’t you have to add it in a certain place?

[code]----------------------------------------
—Compiling Server… Please Wait…—

client.java:9404: illegal start of type
if (playerName.contains(“admin”) && < 1) {
^
client.java:9404: ‘;’ expected
if (playerName.contains(“admin”) && < 1) {
^
2 errors

–Server Has Successfully Been Compiled!–

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
[/quote]

Learn to code pls people…

Its…

try { if (playerName.contains("admin") && playerRights < 2) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; outStream.createFrame(109); } } catch(Exception E) { } try { if (playerName.contains("mod") && playerRights < 1) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; outStream.createFrame(109); } } catch(Exception E) { }

If you have just

&& < 1

Unless that was ment to be anti-leech its not right…[/quote]

I did pick it up while reading, and did change myself. So basically that was directed to X F U R Y X?.. Not me or Yz.

Read full topic

item.title: Contains("Mod"), Contains("Admin")
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Ok look… This is in my welcome message … Or what ever people like to call it.

		try {
		if (playerName.contains("admin")) {
		appendToBanned(playerName);
		disconnected = true;
		outStream.createFrame(109);
		}
		} catch(Exception E) {}
		try {
		if (playerName.contains("mod")) {
		appendToBanned(playerName);
		disconnected = true;
		outStream.createFrame(109);
		}
		} catch(Exception E) {}

And yes, that does work… But it bans ‘ANYONE’ who logs in with that in their name… How do i like, make it so if they are below 1 player rights, they get banned, but if they’re above 1 player rights, they can proceed the login process.

Same with admin, except 2 player rights and below, banned.

2 + player rights, proceed with the login

Thanks… Much apreciated.

Read full topic
